objects.text: • PREMIUM COMFORT • FLYKNIT TECHNOLOGY • ICONIC STYLE

product_details.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Flyknit - Wolf Grey/Gold Edition | Premium Comfort Meets Classic Style
product_details.description:
• ✨ Limited Edition Wolf Grey colorway with striking gold Nike swoosh
• 🧶 Revolutionary Flyknit upper technology for lightweight breathability
• 👟 Classic Air Jordan 1 high-top silhouette with modern upgrades
• 🔄 Flexible knit construction that adapts to your foot shape
• 💪 Durable gum rubber outsole for superior traction and grip
• 🌟 Premium cushioning for all-day comfort
• 🔥 Iconic wing logo detailing maintains heritage design
• ♻️ Sustainable materials with reduced environmental impact
• 🏃‍♂️ Perfect for both athletic performance and street style
• 👔 Versatile colorway pairs well with any outfit

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and modern sneaker advertisement layout. The background consists of a dark radial gradient with abstract golden shapes and a central concentric circle design that highlights the product image. The central focus is a pair of stylish sneakers placed inside a white circular frame. The top portion includes a prominent heading (`heading`) in a large, bold, golden font followed by a white subtitle (`subheading`). Positioned on the right, a highlighted price bubble features the cost (`price`) in a dark font over a golden circle. Near the bottom, a white tagline (`tagline`) emphasizes product features in bold, uppercase typography, and the bottom-center includes a strong call-to-action button (`cta`) with a golden background (`cta_background`) and dark text.

**Color Palette:**
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Dark Gray/Black: `#202020`, `#2A2A2A`, `#3D3D3D`
product_color: The product image features stylish high-top sneakers with a clean and modern color scheme, mainly consisting of light gray and mustard yellow tones. The dominant light gray color (#C3C8CC) forms the primary body of the shoe, offering a neutral, versatile base that exudes simplicity and elegance. Mustard yellow (#D9A441) is used for the branding elements, such as the Nike swoosh, tongue tag, and ankle patch, providing visual contrast and vibrance. The white midsole (#F5F5F5) further highlights the shoe’s clean design, while the gum-colored outsole (#C89F76) blends subtly, grounding the palette with a natural earth tone. The colors blend seamlessly, allowing key details to stand out boldly without overpowering the overall aesthetic. Perfect for a minimalist yet impactful advertisement banner.
